2.15.name: wordpress/wp-slideup
2.15.description:
WPSlideUp is a Wordpress plugin built to present ad content in an especially elegant and appealing way.

This plugin slips ad content from the bottom of your page within a time interval preset by you.

WP SlideUp comes handy in auto responder list building, presenting special offers and images, highlighting pages, spotlighting multimedia content and displaying banner ads.

Sliding content up from the bottom undoubtedly constitutes one of the more tasteful ways to catch your visitor's attention and funnel them accordingly.

WPSLideUp allows you to preset the time interval from when the visitors open your page until the slideup starts which creates more eye catching activity on your page while the visitor is viewing the content.

WPSlideUp allows for scheduling so you can display specific content over a preset period of time, i.e. for Xmas, Ramadan or Valentine's.

WPSlideUp does not limit the number of campaigns you can slide up onto Wordpres
